verses.text_plain: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
verses.verse_html:
1Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess: ▼
▼ Daniel: or, Chileab

verses.text_plain: The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
verses.verse_html: 2The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:

verses.text_plain: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
verses.verse_html: 3The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.

verses.text_plain: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
verses.verse_html: 4These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.

verses.text_plain: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath–shua the daughter of Ammiel:
verses.verse_html:
5And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath–shua the daughter of Ammiel: ▼
▼ Shimea: or, Shammua
 , ▼
▼ Bath–shua: or, Bath–sheba
 , ▼
▼ Ammiel: or, Eliam

verses.text_plain: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
verses.verse_html:
6Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet, ▼
▼ Elishama: also called, Elishua

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Elishama: also called, Elishua

verses.text_plain: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
verses.verse_html: 7And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

verses.text_plain: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
verses.verse_html:
8And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine. ▼
▼ Eliada: or, Beeliada

verses.text_plain: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
verses.verse_html: 9These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon’s son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
verses.verse_html:
10And Solomon’s son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son, ▼
▼ Abia: or, Abijam

verses.text_plain: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
verses.verse_html:
11Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son, ▼
▼ Ahaziah: or, Azariah

verses.text_plain: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
verses.verse_html:
12Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son, ▼
▼ Azariah: or, Uzziah

verses.text_plain: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
verses.verse_html: 13Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

verses.text_plain: Amon his son, Josiah his son.
verses.verse_html: 14Amon his son, Josiah his son.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
verses.verse_html:
15And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum. ▼
▼ Johanan: or, Jehoahaz
 , ▼
▼ Jehoiakim: or, Eliakim
 , ▼
▼ Zedekiah: or, Mattaniah

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
verses.verse_html:
16And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son. ▼
▼ Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin or Coniah

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin or Coniah
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin or Coniah

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
verses.verse_html:
17And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son, ▼
▼ Salathiel: Heb. Shealtiel

verses.text_plain: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
verses.verse_html: 18Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
verses.verse_html: 19And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:

verses.text_plain: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab–hesed, five.
verses.verse_html: 20And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab–hesed, five.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
verses.verse_html: 21And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
verses.verse_html: 22And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
verses.verse_html:
23And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three. ▼
▼ Hezekiah: Heb. Hiskijah

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
verses.verse_html: 24And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
